name: setprojectversion
description: Update a project's Application Version and/or Minimum Required Version.
author: Ryan Tauriainen

inputs.name: versionOptions
inputs.label: Set Application Version

options.fromFile: Revision only. Use Major.Minor.Build supplied in project file.

inputs.helpMarkDown: Selecting `Revision only` will use the Major.Minor.Build (e.g. **1.2.3**) supplied in your project file, and only add the revision number supplied below.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Application Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application Version must be of the format Major.Minor.Build.Revision, e.g. **1.2.3.4**. Variables can be used.

inputs.name: revision
inputs.label: Revision
inputs.helpMarkDown: The revision number to set. This can be a variable.

inputs.name: minimumOptions
inputs.label: Set Minimum Required Version

options.no: Do not update Minimum Required Version

inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum Required Version can be automatically set to the same version as the Application Version, or a custom number. Variables can be used.

inputs.name: minimumversion
inputs.label: Minimum Required Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Minimum Required Version must be of the format Major.Minor.Build.Revision, e.g. **1.2.3.4**. Variables can be used.
